title: Can't start a game.
body:
Since the new client I haven't been able to start a single game. Champ-select works just fine but when everybody picked the countdown freeze at 0 seconds. After a while it says that all my teammates has left the room and it just stays like that. If I restart the client to reconnect I can't reopen the client until I restarted my computer and it still won't let me join. I tried a full repair but it still stays the same. 

I can see in my match-history that I got "Left" games so the games are being played, it just doesn't let me join. Have any one else experienced anything similar or have any idea as to how I fix this. I can also add that I am using the "Low Spec Mode".

replies.body:
Heya! If you would happen to still have the logs from this session, that would help us in tracking down the issue :)

If you can, could you submit a support ticket via support.riotgames.com and attach the logs to it? If you're comfortable uploading the logs to Drive or Dropbox and sharing a link here, that would work as well.

[This article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/231536768-Updated-Client-Known-Issues#h1q2) has a few instruction on how to grab the logs. Feel free to zip up your entire LeagueClient Logs folder if you're not sure which log file it is, or if you've played a few games after you had this issue.

Thanks!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Azmodius,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=UPEObn6E,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-08T22:47:59.145+0000)
>
> Heya! If you would happen to still have the logs from this session, that would help us in tracking down the issue :)
> 
> If you can, could you submit a support ticket via support.riotgames.com and attach the logs to it? If you're comfortable uploading the logs to Drive or Dropbox and sharing a link here, that would work as well.
> 
> [This article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/231536768-Updated-Client-Known-Issues#h1q2) has a few instruction on how to grab the logs. Feel free to zip up your entire LeagueClient Logs folder if you're not sure which log file it is, or if you've played a few games after you had this issue.
> 
> Thanks!

Please tell the people working on the client that it's missing a huge load of features that the old client had.
